name: 告死天使之言 - Death angel
name_original: 告死天使之言 - Death angel
description:
This is a 2 hour horror decryption game.
【story】
There is a rumor in this city about the dead angel.
It is said that as long as people see this creature called the Angel of Death... they will receive an invitation from the Angel of Death.
But the people who went to the appointment... all...
My name is My Wife, and I am a student who lives alone at home.
On the eve of the New Year... I looked at the window inadvertently.
Standing tall in the window outside the window is actually...
